question: On a cold day when a room temperature is 15oC, the metallic cap of a pen becomes much colder than its plastic body, though both are at the same temperature of 15oC, because
option1: metals have higher thermal capacity than plastics
option2: plastics have a lower density than metals
option3: metals are good conductor of heat
option4: plastics have a higher thermal conductivity than metals
answer: metals are good conductor of heat
explanation: No answer description available for this question. Let us discuss.
